text: Werner Düggelin (7 December 1929 – 6 August 2020) was a Swiss theatre director.Werner Düggelin : Porträt und Gespräche on WorldCatWerner Düggelin on VIAF He was born in Zurich and grew up in Siebnen, Switzerland. In 1987, he won the Hans-Reinhart-Ring. Düggelin was known for her stage directions relating to The Importance of Being Earnest, Dom Juan, The Just Assassins, The Lesson and Le Bourgeois gentilhomme. Düggelin died on 6 August 2020 in Basel, aged 90.Ein Glas Wasser regiert die Welt ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Swiss writers Category:Swiss theatre directors Category:People from Schwyz
title: Werner Düggelin
